Airbomber rolled over and put his arms around Infectra. He smiled and was s=
uddenly snoring...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards =

  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 1:47 AM
  Subject:=
 Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Infectra's optics open and see's a bunch of blurs =
till she focuses but was still dizzy* Infectra:....woooooat happened?....oh=
 yeah...I thunk soooo.... *Infectra starts to stand up till she's fully sta=
nding* Infectra: I think that we should see what that we eaten!.... *Infect=
ra says cheerfully before falling back to the ground and than her optics wi=
den* Infectra: I have a....head ache.....and a stomich ache....
    ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    S=
ent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 11:42 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    A=
irbomber walked to Infectra and collapsed near her face down. Stranato fina=
lly caught up to Arrow and grabbed him. Both of them passed out as well. Bl=
ender and Stroghold looked at each other and then shrugged again. They coll=
apsed as well. Train Wreck collapsed. Later, Airbomber wakes up. He walks a=
 step and kneels down, he throws up and stands back up again before falling=
 oveer again, the world was spinning. Stranato came back holding a sleeping=
 Arrow by his arm.

    "Youuuu ookayyeeee?" Stranato asked.

    "I thank =
sue." Airbomber replied. Stranato dropped Arrow and fell. He laughed and gr=
oaned. Airbomber looked back to Infectra to see if she was alright...
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 6:47 PM
      Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra jumps up running behind a bush spitting t=
he mixture out* Infectra:....oohhh..... *Infectra moans because she was now=
 getting a stomich ache* *Infectra walks back out and falls on her back*
  =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:37 PM
        Subject=
: Neo Beast Wars


        Plintissa walked around the desert, night was fa=
lling (Is it okay for night to fall in Plintissa's area?) and she didn't be=
lieve her luck. Her scanner was broken, Artist's scanner was broken or he w=
as too stupid to use it, probably the latter, and she was hungry, there was=
n't anything but sand out here. Now that the sun was going down, it started=
 to cool down and Plintissa was calmed. Plintissa walked on, thinking about=
 how miserable life had been to her, and that it only intended to get worse=
, why did she come to this planet anyway? Why did she leave Cybertron? She =
remembered that she did indeed have ONE friend on Cybertron, a friend that =
loved her with all heart, only problem was, Plintissa didn't love this frie=
nd back, because the friend was a fembot. Plintissa's old friend was eventu=
ally killed by some bots in the shadows, never did catch those creeps neith=
er. She later learned that the murderers were a couple that had killed mill=
ions, but somehow always illuded the cops. Stupid police, never good enough=
 when you need them to be REALLY good, maybe she was expecting too much. Pl=
intissa seen something but assumed it was a mirage, she assumed right...

 =
       Artist walked along the desert, tapping his scanner, it was broken. =
Either Plintissa's scanner was broken or she was too stupid to use it, prob=
ably the latter, he couldn't believe his luck! Artist walked through the de=
sert, thinking about how boring his life was, he walked through the desest,=
 he served crippled bots, he hung around, he did good things and never was =
even noticed, he was tired of it all! The Maximals needed a hero, he brung =
it to them, they never payed him any mind! Artist held his head in rage, hi=
s headache swelling, he snarled a snarl not normally done by wovles. He tra=
nsformed to Beast mode and ran across the desert, howling and remembering. =
He impaled Plintissa on a broken off autogun, he impaled Sinesis the same w=
ay, Plintissa blew him to pieces? He screamed in arge and passed out...

  =
      Dracona walked around the corner, she wouldn't miss the chance to scr=
ew something up in the Pred base since nobody seemed to be there! Dracona s=
lowly made for the entrance...

        Gangon's spark started going dim an=
d started to fade, seeing as how it has been seperated from it's body for s=
o long...

        Sinesis woke up from Stasis lock and pulled away from Bl=
izzard, in extreme pain, he pulled past Quickstrike andf threw Sinister's p=
arts into a CR Tank. Then falling in himself, going into stasis lock. (Orch=
id is unable to reply at the moment, so I went ahead and took my characters=
 to the CR Chamber, don't want them dead.)

        The Radicons went on ea=
ting the stuff and Train Wreck took the time to examine it.

        "This =
was made with poisonous verries and poisonous mushrooms." Train Wreck said.=
 Stranato looked at Arrow with a "Going to kill" look and stood up. He wave=
d for Arrow to come. Arrow started to walk away. Stranato followed him. Arr=
ow ran! Stranato chased him. Blender and Stronghold shrugged and drank beer=
.

        "That was still good eating." Stronghold said.

        "I don't=
 feel too well." Airbomber said. Stronghold and Blender laughed. Train Wrec=
k rolled his eyes and examined the other stuff in the weirf food made by Ar=
row. Squirrel meat? Weird...

        Deemos walked right up to the Maximal=
 base, hoping the autoguns wouldn't fire, and headed toward the entrance...=
